page.title: 10RECREATION 2
page.content: { { }ONE DAY I GOT UP.IT WAS SO EARLY BUT MY FAMILY WAS UP.SO WE WENT TO THE KITCHEN FOR SOME BEAKFAST WE TALKED ABOUT THE WHOLE FAMILY GOING ON A TRIP TO THE ZOO.WE WENT UP STAIRS TO GET DRESSED.THEN WE GOT INTO THE CAR AND DROVE AWAY.THEN WE STOPPED AT THE ZOO.MY MUM AND DAD PAID THE ZOO KEEPER AND WE GOT INTO THE ZOO.I DID NOT KNOW WHY WE WERE AT THE ZOO THEN I REMEMBERED IT WAS MY MUM'S BIRTHDAY.WE HAD SOME ORANGES AND CUT THEM IN HALF THEN WE THREW THEM DOWN FOR THE BEARS TO EAT.ONE OF THEM LANDED ON THE BEARS HEAD.IT WAS SO FUNNY WHEN THE BEAR GROWLED.THEN WE WENT TO THE RABBITS.WE GAVE THEM SOME LETTUCE AND CARROTS.THEN LAST OF ALL WE HAD A RIDE ON THE ELEPHANT.THEN WE WENT IN THE CAR AND DROVE AWAY.
